content: ensuring the loop fits around it page 2 of 5 © gilly bettney 2008 version 1 2 bag 5 chain slip_stitch into the first chain to form a ring 1 6 double_crochet into the ring continue in spirals without joining each round 2 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around 12 3 *1 double_crochet into the first stitch 2 double_crochet into the next repeat from * around 18 4 *1 double_crochet into each of the next 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet into the next repeat from * around 24 5 *1 double_crochet into each of the next 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet into the next repeat from * around 30 6 *1 double_crochet into each of the next 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet into the next repeat from * around 36 continue increasing in this manner increasing 6 stitches each round until you reach 96 stitches 16 *1 double_crochet into each of the next 14 double_crochet 2 double_crochet into the next repeat from * around 96 17 *3 chain miss the first double_crochet 1 double_crochet into the next repeat from * around ending with 3 chain 18 miss next 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet into the next 3 chain loop of the previous round *3 chain 1 double_crochet into the next 3 chain loop repeat from * around ending with 1 double_crochet into the first 3 chain loop formed at the start of the round the end of round 17 and the start of round 18 19 repeat round 19 20 *5ch 1 double_crochet into the first 3 chain loop repeat from * around ending with 5 chain 21 *1 double_crochet into the next 5 chain loop 5 chain repeat from * around ending with 5 chain repeat round 21 three more times 25 *1 double_crochet into the next 5 chain loop 7 chain repeat from * around ending with 7 chain page 3 of 5 © gilly bettney 2008 version 1 2 repeat round 25 twice 28 *1 double_crochet into the next 7 chain loop 5 chain repeat from * around ending with 5 chain repeat round 28 twice 31 *1 double_crochet into the next 5 chain loop 3 chain repeat from * around ending with 3 chain 32 1 double_crochet into the next 3 chain loop 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet *1 chain miss 3 chain loop 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet repeat from * around ending with 1 double_crochet into the last double_crochet 33 1 double_crochet into each double_crochet and each 1 chain space around 96 34 1 double_crochet into each double_crochet around 96 repeat round 34 twice then attach the pocket as follows 36 12 double_crochet 1 double_crochet through the first double_crochet of the pocket and the next double_crochet of the bag top see photos below continue working through both double_crochet s for the next 19 double_crochet 1 double_crochet into each double_crochet to end 96 37 1 double_crochet into each double_crochet around 96 38 10 double_crochet 25 chain miss 25 double_crochet 23 double_crochet 25 chain miss 25 double_crochet 1 double_crochet into
